text: Roberto Gastone Zeffiro Rossellini, (8 May 1906 – 3 June 1977), was an Italian movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in Rome. He was best known for his movies Rome, Open City (1945), Paisà (1946) and Germany, Year Zero (1948). Rossellini died from a heart attack in Rome, Italy, aged 71. ==Other websites== * Category:1906 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian television directors Category:Television producers Category:Television writers Category:Writers from Rome
title: Roberto Rossellini
